name: "One Idea One Week, One Game" - Game 1
name_original: "One Idea One Week, One Game" - Game 1
description:
"One Idea, One Week, One Game" is a series in which you get a Game Idea generated and you have one week to do your best to create a game.

Game 1 

You find yourself in a jungle, where you partake in a little adventure. You need to find all the items, the four mysterious books. But, you have limited time to do so, for your life depends on it!

 Instructions

Find all 4 books before your time runs out (death!)

Keybinds

Movement - WASD

Interact - F
